entry.data:
CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS AROUND 90
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

SUNNY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR, HOT
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
